title.rendered: Official University of Zululand Handbook 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The University of Zululand Handbook consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • University of Zululand admission process.

Our Handbook outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at University of Zululand based on the information provided within it.

University of Zululand Student Portal

Note: University of Zululand’s Handbook is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

University of Zululand Handbook 2024

The University of Zululand Handbook is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.unizulu.ac.za.

University of Zululand Handbook 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

 

see also Official Goldfields College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
